metadata.title: Forever Angel Women's 100% Silk Lace Camisole Cami Tank Top
features: Classic camisole in buttery soft stretch jersey
Scalloped lace trim at the neckline
Perfect for layering or on its own as a top
Body: 100% Mulberry Silk; exclusive of trim. Stretchy And More Comfortable
30 Degrees Light Machine Washable; Use Neutral Detergent Or Special Silk Detergent; Hang Tt On Hanger And Dry Place Away From Direct Sunlight
description: ♦This top features pretty lace, made of 100% Mulberry silk with stretch, more comfortable,soft; ♦The extremely soft knitted-silk material will gently hug your body and will not create any pressure points even when you creased it ; ♦Silk knitting is made of superior quality silk which is known as the "Queen of Fiber" for its softness, good ventilation, high moisture absorption, high intensity, good elasticity and smoothness ;Pure silk contains protein which can protect human skin, so the silk knitting is healthy and comfortable to wear.  ♦Experience the luxury of Classic Silk and you will become a believer that nothing feels better than high quality silk!

Size Type:Petite General size XS / (US size 2) : Bust(31.5"/80cm), Waist(30"/76cm), Hem(32.8"/82cm), Length(20.4"/51cm) General size S / (US size 4~6) : Bust(33.9"/86cm), Waist(31.5"/80cm), Hem(34.6"/88cm), Length(20.9"/53cm) General size M / (US size 8~10) : Bust(36.2"/92cm), Waist(33"/84cm), Hem(37"/94cm), Length(22"/56cm) General size L / (US size 12~14) : Bust(37"/94cm), Waist(34.6"/88cm), Hem(37.8"/96cm), Length(22.8"/58cm)
